tool_description: Calculates movement speeds, velocities, and acceleration patterns from GPS tracking data with temporal analysis capabilities.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same length.
Insufficient data points: Need at least 3 GPS fixes for speed calculations.
Invalid timestamp format: All timestamps must be valid ISO 8601 datetime strings.
Zero time intervals: Some consecutive GPS fixes have identical timestamps.
Non-sequential timestamps: GPS fix timestamps must be in chronological order.
usage: Provide arrays of timestamps, latitudes, and longitudes with at least 3 sequential GPS fixes. The tool calculates instantaneous and average speeds between fixes.

instantaneous_speeds_kmh.description: Speed between consecutive GPS fixes in km/h

average_speed_kmh.description: Overall average movement speed in km/h

movement_classification.description: Classification of movement pattern based on speed analysis
